channel.title: Need help jar and signing! my client! help!
channel.description: Ok so I get down to the last step where I sign my client and it takes like 20 years to say it's completed, But IT DOSN'T DO NOTHING! It's Just a white screen! HELP!

item.title: Need help jar and signing! my client! help!
item.dc:creator: @Wildyscape562 Wildyscape562
item.description:
@Wildyscape562 wrote:

Well if your talking about when you finally jar and sign it, then that is probably because you have the Cache in with the client, you need to upload all the files in the cache to a zip folder on a upload site, then put the link in the proper place in CacheDownloader.java and sometimes in client.java . Sorry im in a hurry or else i would have made this alot better help, needing to sleep, your more than welcome to pm me at any time as i may be able to help. And the white screen, is this when you try to load the .jar file or? Also, if your cache is in your client folder, and you change it then you need to go into signlink and edit the path it goes from which will be something like s= s1= that format, somewhere like that. Some do not have it in that order and some do. If your using custom cache alot of clients have problems with that, aswell as me and then i will not be able to help you because i still have yet to figure it out Hopefully you get this fixxed Happy moparscaping

Read full topic
item.source: Need help jar and signing! my client! help!
